game

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the entire game world. (Designed to be instantiated just once for the whole game).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      World(int screenwidth, int screenheight)
      Create a new World object.

    • Method Summary

      Render the entire screen, so it reflects the current game state.

      Update the game state for a frame.

            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Update the game state for a frame.
        Parameters:
        dir_x - The player's movement in the x axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        dir_y - The player's movement in the y axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).

      • update

        public void update(float dir_x,
          float dir_y,
          int delta,
          int mouse_x,
          int mouse_y)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Update the game state for a frame when the mouse button is pressed
        Parameters:
        dir_x - The player's movement in the x axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        dir_y - The player's movement in the y axis (-1, 0 or 1).
        delta - Time passed since last frame (milliseconds).
        mouse_x - The x position of the mouse.
        mouse_y - The y position of the mouse.
        Throws:
        org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
